reviewText: I have been a long time Katt Williams fan and have a few other of his stand-ups on DVD. This pretty much seemed like he needed money so he put a DVD together. This isn't even comedy; he is preaching for most of it and the other part is straight politics. He makes very few jokes the entire time. He mostly warns people against the end of the world; he goes on to attack non-christians and anyone who believe in evolution. Extremely disappointing and short -- at the end, I wanted that hour of my life back.
I watch all of his stand ups and this one wasn't nearly as funny as the rest I laughed a couple times but I wouldnt watch it again like I have all the others

This got to be the worst Katt's show I've ever seen. His previous shows were about making fun of things we usually ignore in regular life or attacking BS that's clearly BS and inspire people to feel better about themselves. This show, however, is all about ranting, attacking everything that he's not believing in and it's not very funny. Especially when he make fun of things he has no idea what's he talking about; evolution is wrong be cause there're still monkeys, Buddha is fat shirtless man (clearly he's never seen that keanu reeve's movies) etc. The flow of his talk isn't good either. There's always a pause in the middle of his sentence like he couldn't remember what to say. Watch his show in 2008 and watch a clip of this show on youtube, you will see a clear different.

I've been a Katt Willaims fan for a while and I was stoked when I saw a new special for him pop up. I decided to rent it and show it to a few friends who had never seen Katt before. It quickly turned into a nightmare however when Katt began attacking gays, anyone who's not a christian, and making claims that evolution was a joke because there are still monkeys... Clearly Katt, you don't really know how evolution works.

We continued to watch but it progressed into a train wreck. You can clearly see some members of the audience in this aren't on board either. I'm not sure where Katt was coming from in this and found it rather awkward and some what embarrassing. I wasn't aware of all the issues with the law Katt has been having in his personal life, but his anger and rage clearly comes out on stage here. This is not a normal Katt Willaims show so beware.

To say that Kattpacalypse was a disappointment would be putting it mildly. Anyone who is expecting the irreverent and outrageous wit that we enjoyed in his earlier comedy specials are in for a big let down. While the beginning could have almost been considered mildly funny, it still wasn't up to par with even the most rookie comedians on tv today. By the end, he seemed to be on the verge of a complete meltdown. Maybe I was so sorely disappointed because this wasn't at all what I was expecting from a Katt Williams show and didn't know about all the arrests and crazy things going on in his personal life (which he goes into some detail about). I was just excited when I had the opportunity to watch a Katt Williams comedy special that I hadn't seen before. Apparently Katt is in the process of a downward spiral and it definitely shows in his performance. He doesn't have same stage presence, his delivery is off, his jokes were more deliberately offensive than irreverently funny. He repeatedly went off on rants about God and Satan and the end of the world that were only humorous in a "watching a celebrity train wreck" kind of way. There was some kind of awkward rant about Michael Jackson that never really went anywhere, at least not anywhere close to making me laugh. Worst of all, he did this whole bit about how God destroyed homosexuals in Sodom and Gomorrah which I found absolutely repulsive. He spent the entire show running maniacally around the stage sweating. The whole performance was awkward and uncomfortable and so far from the level of comedy anyone would expect from a comedian of Katt Williams standard. I hope he pulls it together because Katt was one of the best.

I love Katt Williams- I am a big fan. But this show just missed the mark in a lot of ways. To echo others, it started off strong, and then about midway through, he lost me entirely. Rants about how evolution is a joke and those that believe in it are crazy? Anti-gay statements? Attacking athiests? He seemed to get overly political, and unfortunately, not as funny. I felt alienated. Katt is a smart guy! He must know that he has to be losing fans through the message on this DVD. But... It is what it is. He needs to tighten up the political and religious stuff ala Lewis Black, or he needs to go back to talking about pimp culture...
If you like katt Williams you'll like this. It's not his best work but it definitely has its moments. I enjoyed it. The DVD arrived right on time.

This was solid comedy in my opinion. Katt Williams is known for keeping in touch with current events and this by far was a dose of reality. I think it was very personal but with what he has been through since his last stand-up special, it is only right that he comment on it, because that is reality for him. He was very in touch with what the everyday person goes through, but he also let the audience in on what he has been going through. I saw it for free on Showtime on Demand and I have no hesitations about purchasing the DVD.

a must have for any katt williams fan. Howvever be warned that it has less jokes in it then the other 2 shows and contains alot more preachy commentary. I probably won't buy it,after seeing it the other day at a friends...
okay

I was very disappointed in Kattpacalypse. After Pimp Chronicles, It's Pimpin Pimpin, and American Hustle this just did not live up to the quality of comedy that Katt had been putting out show after show. His past stand-ups were full of one-liners and this was hard to push through as a dud. I will always love Katt's work but this didn't live up to the rest.
Love katt!!!
One of the funniest comedy routines ever!!!  I love this DVD and watch it often with my friends and family.  Don't hesitate, buy it and laugh till it hurts.
love Katt
He definitely knows how to control the stage and crowd.

He was too messed up. Which makes me sad because he is a great comedian. Not this time. It was unbearable. He was twitchy and sweating. Plus he was rambling. He is a genius at comedy. But this was not good. I know this was a few years ago. I pray he is better and back on track. Back to his talent!
Great and easy transaction!  Thanks!
Very funny guy
I know, I watch this  at least three times cause you get a good laugh I'm looking forward to buying more of his comedy.
Other than a few funny moments, this show sucked. I love Katt Williams but this particular one was a waste of my time and money.
Funny but profane.
Great comedian.
One my favorite comedians.  Funny, as always.  If you are a fan, you must add this to your collection.  Pop it in around 4:35, and you will laugh your ass off!
enjoyed it
Not that funny as others. Needs new material.
Good
gift for my husband. Loved it
Funny but not as good as his earlier stuff
Thanks
Great standup for Kat Williams! He was speaking a lot of truth in this one!
Bull
Like Katt
really great
everything came as promised, ty

I would recommend this to anybody that has no problem laughing at themselves or anybody else! If you are "politically correct" this movie isn't for you, but if you like to laugh and laugh hard! Katt Williams is your guy! I saw this movie on Netflix and instantly thought of my younger brother! He loved it as much as I did! It does have some "rough language", but "get over it! It's funny!
Funny Funny Funny Funny and we all know Katt and he is hilarious.  I have all of his standup and I have not been disappointed yet

Katt Williams is at his best! The moment he steps on stage the party starts. He can make some weird faces that will make you holler out loud. I had caught bits and pieces of his acts before. Not this time, I watched the whole thing nonstop. When you are ready to see it, get all your refreshments before you start the show. I am a new fan of Katt Williams.
My girlfriend loved it!! It came sooner than we thought! u must buy this too funny and totally awesome yes yes

**Spoiler Alert**

I LOVE Katt. Always have, always will. But this abomination of a stand up seemed rushed, preachy, and just plain ignorant. When comedians speak on current events, religion and politics, they tend to do their homework prior to running their mouth in front of millions of people. Katt decided to get his news from conspiracy theory websites and a crackhead who smoked bath salts. Save yourself the money and look it up on youtube if you really want to waste your time watching it.

I've always loved Katt Williams' comedy. He's always been immensely entertaining with his racial humor, his physical humor, and his voice inflections. This time, though, it was off the mark. He tried Carlin-esque, attack-style political humor, but just seemed like a huge, bigoted grump; shallowly bashing atheists, evolution, homosexuals, etc. Some of it was good (when he stuck to what he was good at), but all in all, including the angry heart-to-heart near the end, it was very awkward. Perhaps Katt should've stayed retired.

This is highlarious.
Katt is an amazing talent.  He is a natural for sure.  He definitely knows his craft.
If you watch it once you should watch it 5 more times.
I laughed so hard enjoyed the movie. Katt Williams was funny I enjoyed the movie I watched it again and again.

I expected more...and received mediocre jokes with very little humor. I just didn't think this was funny...Maybe he should focus on being funny without the over saturation of racial stereotypes. Don't get me wrong, stereotypes are funny but this cannot be the entire basis for your show....and the stereotypes he chose to use were dull.
it had its funny parts in the dvd  but i've seen others of his that blew this one clean away
one of the great comic performers of a generation at his best and on recording for your entertainment I Highly recommend
I have seen a ton of Katt Williams shows and think he is hilarious. This one is definitely worth renting or buying.
I am a katt Wuilliams fan and will always will be, I enjoy his kind of comedy. He is sometime over the top, but I like my message unsantisized. I will continue to follw Katt in the future.

I am a Katt Williams fan.  BUT, this DVD disappointed on so many different levels.  I had read in the news that he was having some troubles and this DVD confirmed the rumors.  Hopefully, Katt will get it together.  He is a very funny comedian.  It would be a shame to see that kind of talent wasted.
i love it this is funny an i like me some katt williams if u like stuff like this i recommend it ...

Some of my fondest memories are of times huddled up with a ton of friends to put on one of Katt's big 3 specials. It was hard to tell what was more amazing; how funny the lil' dude was or how much funnier his jokes seemed every damn time.

I ignored the low ratings on IMDB (somewhere sub 5) and dove right in.

Don't.

Go throw on one of the others; you'll laugh a hell of a lot harder.
This wasn't as funny as his other stand up comedies but it was still pretty funny. I would recommend it.
This was a great comedy viewing! I loved it. Katt Williams has a magical way with the audience. I would definitely love to see a live show!
Katt seems to have lost it, he used a few of the same jokes as before, and I  started doing something totally different completely forgetting the show was even on.

This guy is so funny but he really touches on truth about different subjects. I was surprised at how much he has aged in this video. You are guaranteed to laugh with this fellow, my money was definitely not wasted.

Katt Williams is both hilarious and clever. I have several of his DVDs. My husband won't watch him because of the profanity which is admittedly frequent and probably offensive to many but I just overlook it because the laughs are well worth it to me.
He started snapping a bit and lost the crowd on some of his comments i.e. the Obama comment and some other comments went into the stratosphere. But overall he was funny
Katt Williams always make me laugh until I cry. I love him and his comedy. He is always up on the news and makes great jokes on current events. Love this mucho!
Better than any of his other works. He shows depth that was previously unseen. Must see. Made me smile to see him again.
I like Katt Williams mostly.  This is a funny stand up and may be worth it.  I just think his other stuff is better a deserves a look before this dvd.

Katt William's Speaking the truth as always while still being gut wrenchingly funny. This stand up had serious topics people should listen and take heed too. Few entertainers speak truth and/or their own opinions about the world. Katt Williams does it without fear and I love him for it. KATT PACK ALL DAY
This Kat is very funny. I've watched a few of his shows, but this by far in my opinion would be his best yet. Dude is historical person.
I am mad that I didn't hear about this being on HBO when it initially came out. worth renting/buying he spoke truth in this one.
It's okay. I think the latest material of his is way better than this and a lot funnier. He is a talented man though.
it would be great if comedians would realize the strong language dose not means they are funny  nor is it a true testament of their talent
I wouldn't watch this with kids in the room.  He is funny and has a message to bring but it's hard to pick  out of the really heavy language.
I've always thought Katt was funny. Kattpacalypse is not as funny as some of his other tapes but it's still funny.

Nothing like his prior performances.  Was not funny at all.  Punch lines were out of place, he actually looking like he was under the influence during the performance.  Sorry Katt, this is by far your worst performance.
This made me laugh.  Kat's  done better, but he is still awesome in this.  It is worth the cheap fee to rent it, I would not buy it though, u may not want too watch multiple times.
katt is just real and funny all at the same time.  he is one of my favorite comedians to watch often.

Katt Williams makes me laugh like no other. His insightful material, priceless expressions and impeccable delivery make him one of a kind . He is obviously an extremely intelligent man who has an amazing gift and if you look past his comedy and listen to him during interviews you can see he has a heart as big as the audience who loves him. He was a bit more wired up at this performance but was the Katt that I love. The man has been through some very undeserved troubles lately but with his indomnible spirit I know he will continue to make us laugh. His physical comedy and his unique use of the stool as a prob is amazing he really needs to be in many more movies as well as he is a natural comic that has more than earned his right to be at the top of the list. He can make anything funny. The one downside is I was not crazy about the hair, I find Katt to be a very sexy man, his manner his confidence his spirit and his style of dressing are very appealing love how he rocks a tie and suit very classy....but the extreme flip though adding to the mood of the moment....took away from his awesome suit and his handsome face. If you like the truth delivered to you fast, furious and funny, Katt is your man. I have always been a fan of comedy and Katt has carved his own unique spot in its world. I love Katt forever and hope to see him a lot more and for many many years to come .
This was ok. Not the best work from Katt. The ending was terrible though. You can't be opinionated in a comedy show.
ENJOYED THIS SHOW IMMENSELY.  KATT WILLIAMS IS THE MAN OF COMEDY.  REMINDS ME OF A YOUNG RICHARD PRYOR. LOOKING FORWARD TO MORE BY HIM.
So hilarious one of his best yet.i am a huge katt Williams fan till this day.he has the funniest material ever

This movie didn't compare to his other stand up acts. I had high hopes because all of his previous movies are hilarious. It might have been the fact that a lot of the jokes were based around the "2012 Apocalypse", and I watched it well after Dec so 85% of the jokes were outdated.

I loved Katt Williams up until this stand-up special--he seems to have gone a little nuts...and not in a funny way.  Where was the humor?  He spent way too much time discussing his personal fears and irrational views that I found completely un-relatable.  I want old Katt back.
Katt Williams is one of the few people whom I stop and listen when they speak.  He brings insight to many topics.  Listen to his interviews.

Katt is to funny, he keep you laughing. the jokes and the timing is spot on. He remind me of Eddie Griffin, however he is funnier.
Especially his jokes about the terrorist. I am ordering Eddie Griffin as soon as I complete this, which is now lol.
Katt is one of my favorite comedians, however, I didn't think this tape was as funny as some others of his I have veviewed.
Katt Williams is so much fun, I only wish this video was longer. So happy he is out of retirement!

I was shocked at the low ratings this got. Katt Williams is as funny as he ever was. Considering it was NYE I'll let all the gloom and doom about the end of the world go but his other jokes were right on the money. When comedians start talking about real issues it makes some people uncomfortable so they're quickly labeled as "crazy" or "cracked out" but I disagree. I really liked this movie and I'm looking forward to his next project.
This was the best purchase of a dvd, not only was it in perfect condition it was the funniest comedy movie!
I love Katt Williams!!! I love all of his stand-up and the movies that he's been in. He keeps it real and is funny as hell.
Katt just before he lost it more or less. I'm a fan so it was good to me. Glad that I rented it.

Some of it is quite hilarious, and some of it is just the cold hard truth. What you get to witness is what fame and stardom can do to somebody not ready for everything that comes with it. He seems to be saying to me all that glitters is not gold, and he is not willing to pay the price of which it cost. So I predict as talented as he is, we will never get to see him reach his true potential.

Now I see why he has so many probz with the police!! The ill one's don't like when you tel things not sanctioned for our wittle ears... I love Kat, and Amy, and Whitney, and Micheal... should I go on?  Stop killing the talented Hollyweird... Awesome show... smooth streaming

This movie was allright. It's not funnier than its pimpin pimpin or his other movies, but I did laugh some. He keeps it real on a lot of topics and makes you think about stuff that happens in the world.

Absolutely love the show! The truth hurts, but he's hasn't missed a step and wilder than ever. Forget the haters! He must be doing something right cause he has more haters than ever!......Keep it Real Katt.  Will go down as One of The G.O.A.T.
This is why we all love Katt! He shouts it out loud and proud with no apologies.  A must see for all of his fans that thought he could be down for the count.
If you're a Katt fan, this will surely disappoint.  Katt has lost his luster in this performance.  His worst yet.
If you like a lot of screaming nonsense and intentional self-defecation humor then maybe you will like. However  totally not for me.
I thoroughly enjoyed watching this comedy special, but it wasn't worth the $12.99 that I paid for it.  It is only a little over an hour.  I would of expected it to be longer than that.
It's the best since the Pimp Chronicles Pt. 1.  If you're in the mood to laugh, then watch this stand up!
Not as good as all other Katt Williams stand up, but it was still pretty funny. I mean, it is Katt Williams. He's funny all the time.
He is an incredably funny man! Wit and wisdom...but you see him hurting now. I'll be praying for the man.
Chose the rating because it was an unfunny comedy show. His past ones were much better. I would not recommend this to anyone if they're expecting to see something funny.
I'm a huge Katt fan, but this was kind of disappointing.  Some funny parts, but mostly just political ranting and a lot of sweating
A typical, hilarious performance from Katt Williams!  Waiting for a new stand-up by Katt was well worth the wait.  A must have for fans of Katt Williams!
yea it wasn't funny, i mean katt is a naturally funny guy but i did not even finish watching it, made me laugh like once and i was like ahh ok i need to watch something else lol

Katt Williams is the downest n1gg4 for real & now they're after him for speaking T R U T H. I understand every single thing he's trying to say, even if it's suppose to come off as a joke he's trying to tell us truth about things we THE PEOPLE need to listen to. That's why they're on his 4SS 'cus Katt's expooooooooooosing these confused & sorry individuals. Word, SATAN AIN'T S***and that's the realest, truest thing anyone can ever say :)
This was OK, but I think it's going to be hard for him to top some of his previous stand-up specials.

If you've paid attention to the news, you know that Katt Williams is not what he used to be, that's how I feel about this performance. Where his former performances were, funny, lighthearted,whimsical and inclusive. This performance was devisive, mean spirited, and not too particularly funny. In the past  Mr. Williams was hysterically funny, and entertaining but now he seems erratic, and silly. This was interesting, but not entertaining.
Comedians tell their story through their jokes. Williams says a mouthful. Good comeback after his self induced retirement. He's still a favorite of mine.
i mostly smiled...thanks for the smiles katt!!! those with poor listening skills and discernment ...please avoid this entertainment and keep it moving. ;-)
As advertised, always funny. His whole demeanor will have u rolling on the floor. I would love to see Katt Williams and Kevin Hart together.
I enjoy katt but this was far from his best work it was ok . Hopefully his next one is better!
I was excited to see this, but I was disappointed at the end. Kat Williams is not funny anymore. What happened to him?

I watched this and was very disappointed.  In the very end he said things against a Pastor and his church members that was insulting and down right disrespectful.  I vow to NEVER support ANYTHING that this little man does ever again.  He obviously has a mental problem.  That is why he is incarcerated now.  He really need to be in a mental ward.  It's obvious that he is coming loose at the seams in this production.  It's really a sad thing to see. Don't waste your money on this.  I had a free rental so I rented it.  I am very happy I didn't waste my money renting or purchasing this trash.
other words in his vocabulary than n*&&$%, and there have to be other ways to make a joke than comparing Black people to White people.

I thought Katt did okay in this dvd.  He wasn't die hard funny but did just enough to keep me watching the entire show.  His older stuff is definitely much funnier but I'd still go see him in concert.

Although Katt seemed jacked-up & manic (hopefully he is ok healthwise), he had me captivated the whole time, even if I didn't agree with him 100%. He was funny but yet, so REAL.

The man has more going on than a bunch of these reviewers know. It's his show, his money & his time, to do & say whatever he wants. I think people use comedy to escape, and too bad for them, Katt brought it so close to reality...I think it made them stop & think & question, instead of just laughing everytime he said "n****."

To be quite honest, I've never been a huge fan of his because it seemed all he did was talk about race & women, with the f & n-words being 90% of his "funny." This piece made me see a better, maybe less sensational, side of him.

I like relatable comedy, and I think most people prefer distanced comedy, that takes them somewhere they don't go in their own lives. If you've lived through much adversity, and can handle the truth, you should appreciate this side of Katt.
I purchased this just because it was Katt's newest stand-up. It was okay but not as good as Pimp Chronicles or Live.

It seemed forced to me. Like he just had to try to be funny for money. Of course, it had some funny parts, but he isn't like he used to be. He might need to quit smoking cause it's damaging his brain for real.
I'f you enjoy stand up comedy and just love this kind of humor your will love this. Not the usual Kat William style but it was a good change.
Love Katt as always, always telling it as it is and making us laugh and the stupid every day s*** that most comics overlook. Insightful and intelligent.

With my expectations set very high, I purchased this new stand up from Katt Williams, and I was very disappointed. There were a couple of small laughs, but overall Katt seemed disconnected from the audience and goes on multiple rants. For all of you who loved the Pimp Chronicles, do not buy this.

Funny.  No, it won't knock your socks off with in your face jokes but that's because we're used to his comedy by now.  The set has has good jokes that are relevant for the most part. I laughed hard quite a few times and found this more than worth the time and money I spent.  As far as offensive, what do you expect? This is a man that made his name on speaking his mind and that hasn't changed.  Good entry in his stand-up series.
It's entertaining enough for the 99 cents I spent on it.  But I wouldn't say it measures up to Katt's old stuff.
Perhaps I'm just Katt'ed out or something. This show didn't seem as funny as his other shows to me, either that or I am just over saturated with his material.

What. The. Hell.

My, how the mighty have fallen.

Katt has basically given over his throne to Kevin Hart cause this is some BS right here.

I will say, I did chuckle a couple times watching this, but compared to his other stand up pieces, this is atrocious.  There is no comedic point of view.  He will take one subject and go on about the negative traits, the stand up for the subject with positive attributes.  You're like, huh!?

He needed an editor for the material he had and quite frankly new material.

So VERY disappointed.

Not too many comic can make you roll with laughter lie Katt Williams can!  He takes you place you never thought you would go and perhaps never want to be again!  I hear him in my head at some of the oddest situations and have to simply smile to myself.  Its true, you must watch the company you keep........................
If you like Katt Williams other stand-ups than you'll definitely love this one! His comical faces and comments make you laugh and also makes you wonder, as well!

If you are looking for comedy that is aimed at only making you laugh but is void of any substance than this is not for you. He presents some interesting ideas about what is happening in both the political world as well as touching on topics we have encountered in mainstream media today. Towards the end of the show he does arrive at a plateau where he incites the audience to draw in and commend a sort of intimacy between himself and his audience. Katt Williams is a dynamic comedian who brings forth some thought provoking ideas and points out details that to some may not be so obvious. This is great comedy for people who listen well, remember details of the stand up, and in turn research them a bit further. All in all, this is a great show I recommend for an older audience as some of the topics he discusses are not suited for children or tween aged kids.

If you are into conspiracies than this is a fun movie to watch. Some eyebrow raising moments but they won't leave you without a good laugh.
Katt is hilarious,  there is no contesting that!! However I would have liked to see him be a bit more respectful toward various religious beliefs and even lifestyles
I love Katt Williams, this dvd was not as funny as many of the others I have seen, but I did find myself laughing...
I expected a little more in the comedic realm however it appeared that he was relaying a positive message and not really something hilarious.
I've been waiting for Katt to produce another special for some time one, I thought it was well done and I def had my share of laughs,but just not as good as his last couple.
KATT WILLIAMS IS THE FUNNIEST COMEDIAN HIS MOVIES ARE THE BEST. IF YOU WANT A GOOD LAUGHT I RECOMNED YOU WATCH ANY OF HIS MOVIES.

Normally I purchase DVDs rather than rent them because I like to watch them more than once.  With this artist, however, one viewing is enough.  Hope fully one day he will learne the meaning of OVERKILL
I usually like Katt Williams's comedy and the first half hour or so was very funny and then the last half hour just felt like he was just ranting.

I love Katt, I have seen him live three times and have all his DVD's but I was disappointed with this.  He looks worn and tired and his routine was worn and tired.  I actually fell asleep,  twice, trying to watch it.  I  gave it a three because I am loyal to Katt but I think his personal life has interferred with his professional career.  This was just not funny.

This is not one of those times.  Hit and misses....mostly misses. Katt has been having issues lately, according to the news, and I think that it has greatly affected his stand-up.  I hate when the greats throw something out there just to have something out there. SMH
Mayor of whooville is in rare as usual.  He used fresh material and he keeps it 100.  What more can I say?!

I generally love his material and Katt as a comedian but as a gay man I don't agree with his being gay is not a civil rights issue as compared to slavery comment . ask any family who has lost a member who has been bullied and beaten to death or comitted suicide because they couldn't handle being Gay any more his comments suggest its an immoral choice which is ignorant as hell. the injustice suffered is on an individual level as compared to a mass group of people because gay people are mixed through out society in our culture. Ask most Gay Black men and I would think they would not agree with him. Then at the end of the show he just tops it of with a steaming pile of religious shit on gay men. Thank you Katt . I guess I am a little pissed as a gay man and Child of God and Jesus you can go back into retirement as far as I'm concerned I was laughing for like 98% of the show but them i felt like you just spit on my face during the last 5 min

I love Katt, but this show was terrible! His jokes were way off base and insulting on a level I couldn't find remotely funny. He kept going on about "finding faith" and "believing in something... anything" on the brink of 2012. If it was meant to be funny it failed, because it just came across as fearful and paranoid. Katt has always struck me as a relatively informed and intelligent person, but his behavior was erratic and his jokes revealed some highly ignorant views. He continuously broke off in tangents and failed to finish many of his jokes, relying on the audiences affinity for him and their overwhelming applause to fill the silent void where his punchlines should have been. Not his best work. Rent it if you feel you must see it. DO NOT BUY. As a Katt fan, I wouldn't recommend it to anyone... ever.
All Katt williams shows are too funny, This one was almost like preaching a sermon with cuss words.. funny funny
Went to this show live! When it came through my way he was very slow to get through his jokes and walked off before he finished, do not buy this !!
Katts best work. a very talented actor/comic that is always honest. Kat, brother i want to hang out with you.
I liked this movie, but it wasn't Katt's best. He was very real and to the point! Funny, but I didn't laugh all the way through.
great fast delivery I laughed the entire time I am a true fan of Katt williams and enjoyed the comedy show. i reccommend everyone to buy it and add to their collection
Wow.....what happened to Katt????? Used to be my favorite comedian. Unbelievable how far he has fallen. First 15 minutes is great, then he just jumps off a cliff. Sad.
I can't believe I wasted my money I thought it was going to be like all his other shows but this one sucked
Keeping it real is keeping it real. the fact that the country, can't tell the truth about what goes on in poletics, tells us what it means telling the truth to our Kids, means to us.

I am a KATT fan. He left the laugh scene for a bit. So imagine how excited I was for his return. But to my surprise, this release was flooded with negative reviews: "He's not funny" or "...pray for him." Wow-so much so I was ready not to buy this KATT release. But over the years he has proven to be funnier more times than not so I owed Kattpacalyse a chance. Honestly: I laughed for 60 minutes straight. If you are a fan of his style and confidence, this performance delivers. He was on point with every topic and produced razor sharp delivery. I appreciated the fact that he squared off with topics of the now. For those  looking for the pimp chronicles 3, maybe next time. Right now, KATT blasts off on "twenty-twelve" and keeps you locked in for the whole ride. Is it his greatest performance? No. Is it his most relevant performance to date? Absolutely. He is real. He is correct. Let's do it again. Keep the cops away and the KATT will play.
What u expect from Katt Wiliams if u are a true fan. This one is very funny. I wish it was a lot longer. And I would recommend to anybody if you want a good laugh.
This performance just wasn't up to the standard that Williams has done in the past. I was disappointed because I think he is a great comedian.
Wasn't my husband and my favorite of his specials but it was nice to see him back again. Hopefully he will keep making DVDs and find his groove again.

I normally think Katt Williams is very funny but this stand up was terrible. I know that his stand up is not one for kids so I am not surprised by anything he says but his whole routine was nothing but GD this and GD that. It was not funny at all. I watched about 15 minutes of it and couldn't stand anymore.

Katt looked like he had no idea what he was gonna say up there, and if id have heard "this is 20-12 damnit!" One more time i'd have pulled my hair out. Should have used the one set he used for just about every other set he's ever done. At least it was funny

As Usuall Katt is at his best.  Love his humor, hate his swearing, but because he is good at what he does, you can look past it.  truth will always hurt, but it can be seasoned a bit with sweet words.

As a fan of Katt Williams, I really anticipated the release of this stand up performance.  It came highly recommended by friends, but its safe to say I was disappointed.  Although it did have its funny moments, it often came off preachy and soap boxish.

Typical Katt Williams Performance, nothing overly funny about this film and it left me disappointed. There were comedians who performed before his appearance that caught my attention, but they were given a very short spotlight on the end credits. I would have liked to see those performers entire Standup.
Disappointed with this one.  Sorry, Katt!  I guess nothing commpares to your Pimp Chronicle days!  This performance just was not a LOL type of event.  I still love you though!
Another hilarious and insightful standup from the non apologetic Katt williams. If you are a fan of his previous dvds then this is a must get.
This was an excellent stand-up comedy. I would recommend this particular dvd to my friends.  I give it 5 stars.
Katt Williams has lost his edge....he is not funny in the least !!!! he needs to find another line of work

This movie is very eye opening. Even though it's funny and entertaining, truth is still being presented. Katt is trying to tell you that Jesus is Lord and He is the only way. Kattpacalpse is a great movie to enjoy and ponder
I see what he see. He's on point! Can't wait to see him perform live in concert. I'll be in line for my ticket!
This was not one of the best shows of his.  I ordered it before it got out, but should have just rented it from Redbox. Material was pretty new, but not his greatest.

I understand Katt Williams has been out the game for a minute but geez. I am highly disappointed in this stand up. He has his funny moments but I honestly think he fell off. I love Katt Williams but this right here isn't cool. He needs to get back on his A game.

I saw this the other night, and it was a waste of time as the Captain D's I had that night lol...What was up with his hair??? He honestly looked like he was on some serious drugs. Now don't get me wrong, there were some funny parts in it, but it's not the same Katt Williams that everyone has grown to love over the years. It seemed like he just ran out of material or something. I'll say it like this...watch for yourself and you decide. But most of the reviews on this haven't been good, and I'm putting mine into that thumb down pool lol.
This is great I was actually at the show and it was hilarious get it and support Katt Williams you won't regret it

Let me first say that I am "HUGE" Katt Williams fan so what I'm about to say comes from the heart..................THIS STAND-UP SUCKS!!!! I was highly disappointed! He looked bad, he sounded bad, timing was off, it was horrid!! If you are a true fan of stand-up comedy and understand everythng about it, this will piss you off highly!! DO NOT BUY IT, RENT IT, WATCH IT, it will just upset you!

This is definitely different and apparently it is because Katt himself is different.  He has had legal troubles and clearly feels exonerated and sure of his source of victory.  He will turn off many watchers because he takes clear stances on hot button issues but he has a right to.  Let's not pretend that we do not have any topics where we choose a side to the malcontent of others.  Thats life.  As far as comedy goes, its really funny at first and slows toward the end.  But I was moved by his honesty whether I agree or not.  He was real to himself similar to Dave Chappelle toward the end.

I persobnally am a huge fan of Katt so getting the new movie before the bootleggers is pretty much the sh**. So i am happy with my purchase as well as shipping time, if u haven't seen it you should get on it. Its not as good as puimp chronicles but he speaks the truth in each movie.

It was not as god as what I have seen before. He has aged and that hair? Hasn't he learned that the sweats a perm too out? Anyway, there were some real truths to what he was saying. There was truth in a lot that he was saying. Guess that isn't really funny.
HILARIOUS
Love Katt
This is a great funny movie,  whenever I need a good laugh after a hard and stressful day, O can always count on Katt.
Loved it.
Just to funneh. But Katt Williams always is!
This wasn't the one I thought it was...but it was good just not great...but that's only my opinion

First time watching this comedian. I guess I just don't appreciate his humor. Poking fun at different racial groups can be funny...at least to me...but this guy seemed filled with a lotta scorn for folks and it didn't translate into humor very well with his "jokes" and commentary. Jus' sayin'...
